mapper.select: SELECT di.index_id, ci.name AS "index_name", ci.unit_id, di."value", di.data_time, di.time_type, di.time_code FROM data_item di LEFT JOIN energy_index ci ON di.index_id = ci.index_id WHERE di.index_id =#{indexId} AND di.data_time < #{endTime} AND di.data_time >= #{beginTime} AND di.time_type = #{timeType} ORDER BY di.time_code;
